attributes.action: Why is David Moyes a Qualified Premier League Manager
attributes.additional_details:
After nearly a decade in a high-powered role at a Premier League Football Club amidst a win rate of under 42%, yet in a seemingly unheralded position of God-Like status, and paid a handsome salary, while in most other walks of life are hit by recession and, in most cases many companies enforce a performance related pay scheme,

I would like to open for debate what criteria qualifies a highly paid professional sports coach as being 'a success'
